references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Imagen Video, a groundbreaking model that significantly advanced video generation capabilities, serving as a key foundation for the current state-of-the-art.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: Glide is a seminal work in text-guided image diffusion models, whose techniques were adapted for video generation, greatly influencing the approaches used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced a novel architecture that significantly improved the quality and resolution of image generation, concepts relevant to the advancements made in video generation.

references.paper_title: MasaCtrl: Tuning-free mutual self-attention control for consistent image synthesis and editing
references.reason: MasaCtrl is among the first to explore attention control in diffusion models for image editing, providing a critical foundation for the attention control techniques used in the presented work for video generation.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-prompt image editing with cross attention control
references.reason: This paper introduced the innovative prompt-to-prompt method for image editing, a technique that inspired the multi-prompt approach in the current work for video generation.
